description.en:
Not Momotaro. Momomaro. Inspired by the fairytale.

"Yōkai, foxes, tanukis, and demons. This is the heavenly punishment for these freakish demons!!" The monster hunt travelogue of a young onmyouji.

Momomaro, a user of shikigamke, takes on strange supernatural phenomena with his partner Dorori! A full-color book of a great adventure and hunting action story published in The Horror (Kadokawa Shoten).

[首館] Kubi Yakata (The Mansion of Heads) A mother and daughter living in a secluded mansion, a wicked scheme to transform into monsters under the guise of a one-night favor.

[屍城の魔術師] Shikabanejou no Majushitsu (The Magician in the Corpse Castle) A magician's plot to revive a dead princess with black magic in order to spread the faith in Satan, the demon king.

[からくり姫] Karakuri-Hime (Automated Doll Princess) taking shelter from the rain, a magnificent and terrifying mechanical doll awaits in an abandoned house built on a cliff.

[大堕羅法師] Daidarabocchi (Daidarabocchi) It is said that at a mysterious temple, girls are offered as human sacrifices to Daidarabocchi.

biography.en:
**Birth:** Sep 5, 1960
**Age:** 64
**Gender:** Male
**Debut Pen Name:** Yamamoto Kazuto (山本和都)

Senno Knife (千之ナイフ) is a talented manga-ka who debuted with Yukihime (Snow Princess) published in 1981 in Comic Lemon People #1 (Cover Date: 1982.02.01... It hit the shops around 15 December 1981) on pages 179-186. Since then he has created a fairly large variety of stories in a multitude of genres. Two genres that he shines in are adult manga and horror, and as of late, he's been doing much more in the horror genre. Formerly an assistant of [Matsumoto Leiji](https://mangadex.org/author/be228b76-d5cf-46ff-9b64-38c1a012574d/matsumoto-leiji), He is married to mangaka/musician [Nekoi Rutoto (猫井るとと)](https://mangadex.org/author/cb5164bc-e34c-415b-a447-089c0b36d808/nekoi-rutoto).

(Source: MU)

**Trackers:** 

- [AniList](https://anilist.co/staff/99382/Senno-Knife) 
- [MangaUpdates](https://www.mangaupdates.com/author/00b73tv/senno-knife) 
- [MyAnimeList](https://myanimelist.net/people/4382/Senno_Knife)
